description:
The Tokeland Fleece Vest is an ideal layer for cool mornings on the trail, skin track, or commuting to class or the office. The 100% recycled polyester fabric is quick-drying and breathable, and the binding elastic arm openings and zip hand pockets provide a snug and comfortable fit. Contrast woven trim fabric offers visual interest.

UPF 30 protection protects from the sun's rays, while the wicking properties help regulate body temperature. The perfect layer for chilly days spent exploring new hiking trails, the Tokeland Fleece Vest is a shoulder season essential.
name: Outdoor Research Tokeland Fleece Vest - Mens
